name: Black Gold Burgers
author: Anonymous
summary: Get down to business with this no-frills burger that celebrates the bold flavors of summer grilling - the secret is in sauce's the perfect balance of seasonings. For an even bigger flavor try this burger made with A.1. Bold & Spicy Steak Sauce.
ingredients: ½ cup A.1. Original Steak Sauce
directions: Cook and stir onions and garlic in margarine in medium skillet on medium heat until tender but not brown; stir in sugar
Reduce heat to low; cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally
Stir in steak sauce; keep warm
Grill patties 5 minutes on each side or until cooked through (160 degrees F)
Place burgers on bottom halves of rolls; cover with sauce and tops of rolls
